mapper.select: SELECT m.memNick, mi.points, mi.coin, mi.levels, b.bookId , bi.bookName , bi.memId , bi.bookAuthor, bi.bookPublish , bi.bookPrice , bi.rentP, b.giver, b.giveNo, b.taker, b.takeNo, b.bdate FROM members m, memInfo mi, bookInfo bi, borrow b WHERE b.bookId=#{bookId} AND bi.bookId=b.bookId AND bi.memId=m.memId AND m.memId=mi.memId
